block.p: LEON-Lee. We celebrate the life and mourn the death of Lee Leon of Beverly Hills (formerly of Scarsdale) who peacefully passed away Saturday July 22, 2000. Devoted wife of Sol, beloved mother of Steven, Susan and Andy (Fredman), adored grandmother of Josh and Ali, dear sister of Jean and Joyce and cherished friend of many. Service Thursday 12:30pm at Zion Memorial Chapel, 785 East Boston Post Rd, Mamaroneck, NY 1 - 888 - 381 - 1809, for directions www.zionmemorialchapel.com. Interment to follow at Sharon Gardens Cemetery, Valhalla, NY.
